value.0: Which spell do you want to alter?
You can alter the ability boosting spells. This page applies to Bull's Strength, Cat's Grace, Eagle's Splendor, Endurance, Fox's Cunning and Owl's Wisdom.
You can alter the light colors for light and continual flame.
You can alter this spell to do a will vs fear and fort vs damage, negative damage is capped at 20d8.
You can alter this spell to target chaos instead of evil and law instead of good.
You can alter this spell to do damage instead.
You can alter this spell between unsummoning your summon and releasing your dominated if they're too strong (level 23+)  or give you a invisibility effect instead.
You can alter which type of weapons this spell with effect.
You can alter this spell to affect everyone within a area of effect.
You can change the damage type of this spell.
You can change the drain type of this spell.
You can change the creatures this spell will hit harder.
You can change the damage type of this spell.
You can change the damage type of this spell.
You can change the damage type of this spell. Reapplying this spell will strip previous appliances of elemental damage of your weapon(s).
You can change the damage type of this spell.

You can use this spell to create lockpicks. The caster level determines the type:

Level 4 and below gives +1 Thieves' Tools
Level 5 to 9 gives +3 Thieves' Tools
Level 10 to 14 gives +6 Thieves' Tools
Level 15+ gives +10 Thieves' Tools
You can change the damage type of this spell. Reapplying this spell will strip previous appliances of anti-undead damage of your weapon(s).
You can change the damage type of this spell.

You can transform this spell into a poisonous arrow. Casting level determines the duration and the following feats influence the type of poison:

No metamagic: DC 14, strength -1D4 and -1D4
Empower: DC 20, strength -1D6 and -1D6.
Maximise: DC 26, strength -1D8 and -2D8.
You can change the damage type of this spell. Reapplying this spell will strip previous appliances of elemental damage of your weapon(s).
Ability: Area of Effect: +2 regardless of metamagic used. Does not stack with itself or the non-BoT variant.
Will vs fear, fort vs damage

damage 6d per caster level sonic and electrical damage capped to 10d6 for each making it 20d6 total damage.
Will for half sonic.
Evasion for half electrical damage.
Will for stun, fortitude for deafened and reflex for knockdown. (default)
Greater Sanctuary, unsummon summoned and release dominated (if they're 23+)
Invisibility, keep my summon and dominated (default)
Attack Bonus & Mighty: Works on all weapons. (Note: weapons that arent a bow, sling or a crossbow only receives attack bonus)
